metadata.name: Star
metadata.description:
In our NFT art works, we tried to convey the magic and beauty that are indispensable elements of Kurosawa's films. You will find in the collection many epic scenes, beautiful landscapes and portraits that reflect the main themes inherent in Kurosawa's works: honor, courage, wisdom and justice.

Each NFT in our collection has its own unique number and is recorded in the blockchain, which guarantees its uniqueness and exclusivity. By purchasing NFT art from our collection, you will become the owner of a valuable and unique work of art that can become not only a valuable collectible object, but also an investment in the future.

Don't miss the opportunity to own exclusive NFT cards created in the style of digital painting and inspired by the works of Akira Kurosawa!
